                                                           int fromColumn,
                                                           org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Row toRow,
                                                           int toColumn)
        Enables filtering for the given range of cells in the specified sheet.
        Parameters:
        sheet - the specified sheet
        fromRow - the first row
        fromColumn - the 0-based index of the first column
        toRow - the last row
        toColumn - the 0-based index of the last column
        Returns:
        the specified sheet

      • autoFilter

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet autoFilter(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet,

                                                           String fromColumn,

        Enables filtering for the given range of cells in the specified sheet.
        Parameters:
        sheet - the specified sheet
        fromRow - the first row
        fromColumn - the letter reference of first column
        toRow - the last row
        toColumn - the letter reference of the last column
        Returns:
        the specified sheet

      • autoSizeColumn

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet autoSizeColumn(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet,
                                                               int index)
        Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit its contents.

        The content of merged cells is ignored.

        This process can be relatively slow on large sheets, so this should normally only be called once per column, at the end of your processing.

        Parameters:
        sheet - the sheet where the column is located
        index - the 0-based column index
        Returns:
        the specified sheet
        See Also:
        Sheet.autoSizeColumn(int, boolean)

      • autoSizeColumn

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet autoSizeColumn(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet,
                                                               String colref)
        Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit its contents.

        The content of merged cells is ignored.

        This process can be relatively slow on large sheets so this should normally only be called once per column at the end of your processing.

        Parameters:
        sheet - the sheet where the column is located
        colref - the letter reference of the column
        Returns:
        the specified sheet
        See Also:
        Sheet.autoSizeColumn(int, boolean)

      • autoSizeColumns

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet autoSizeColumns(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet)
        Adjusts the width of all columns to fit their contents.

        The content of merged cells is ignored.

        This process can be relatively slow on large sheets, so this should normally only be called once per column, at the end of your processing.

        Parameters:
        sheet - the sheet where the column is located
        Returns:
        the specified sheet
        See Also:
        Sheet.autoSizeColumn(int, boolean)
